name: Crunch Chicken Burger Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Crunch Chicken Burger Recipe: Chicken breast 2 flattened Salt ½ tsp Black pepper ½ tsp Chicken powder ½ tsp Crushed red pepper ½ tsp Oil 1 tbsp Bread crumbs as required Hot dog buns 4 Mayonnaise 4 tbsp Hot sauce 4 tbsp Cheese slices 4 Tomato slices as required Iceberg lattice Onion rings Ingredients for batter Flour 3 tbsp Chili sauce 2 tbsp Milk ¼ cup Egg 1
instructions: Flatten chicken breast, marinate with salt pepper chicken powder Add crushed red pepper, oil for 30 mins, dip marinate breast in prepared batter, roll in bread crumbs and deep fry. To assemble Toast buns apply mayonnaise on both the sides, put fried fillet, cut into pieces. Now put cut fillet, drizzle with hot sauce, cut into 2 pcs, veggies top with bun, serve with fries.
